CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 30, 1960, pg. A3 reads: " Wearing Polio Tags - These youngsters, all but the last two on the right, hold their recently 'shot' arms after they were injected with anti-polio vaccine at Vann School this week. Left to right: Judy Jackson, Arnold Jerry, Tyrone Tucker, Bertice LaRoach, Arlene Roberts and Jo Ann Walker. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait from left: Judy Jackson, Arnold Jerry, Tyrone Tucker, Bertice LaRoach, Arlene Roberts and Jo Ann Walker, standing in front polio clinic sign on fence at Robert L. Vann Elementary School, another version
